org.netbeans.core.multitabs

Class TabDecorator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.netbeans.core.multitabs.TabDecorator

  • public abstract class TabDecorator
extends Object
    Register implementations of this class in global Lookup to adjust tab rendering.
